reviews.review: great game, holds up very well after all these years, however the story mode is somewhat short, i was able to beat it in 2 hours but very much worth. has bonus levels and developer commentary, sweet and simple gameplay with fun twisting puzzles. got it in the orange box
I still play this gem through from time to time .. I love the simplicity, the story, the surroundings, the connection with Half Life... everything. Funny and serious at the same time. easy 10/10
